questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates explore an island shaped like a drum and encounter a reindeer doctor. What is...?
Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
This arc revolves around Luffy and his crew's involvement in a massive conflict against Kaido and his forces. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This ability allows its user to swim through the ground as if it were water, used notably by a member of the Shichibukai. What is...?
This latest transformation of Luffy, revealed in the Wano arc, shows a significant boost in his powers and abilities. What is...?
This lesser-known member of the Revolutionary Army is recognized for his ability to create powerful winds and for being the second-in-command to Monkey D. Dragon. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
This character, a key figure in the Wano Country arc, possesses the mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox. Who is...?
